styles.css: & img { background: conic-gradient(from 90deg at top 5px left 5px,transparent 25%, var(--wp--preset--color--primary) 0) 0 0, conic-gradient(from 180deg at top 5px right 5px,transparent 25%, var(--wp--preset--color--primary) 0) 100% 0, conic-gradient(from 0deg at bottom 5px left 5px,transparent 25%, var(--wp--preset--color--primary) 0) 0 100%, conic-gradient(from -90deg at bottom 5px right 5px,transparent 25%, var(--wp--preset--color--primary) 0) 100% 100%; background-size: 50px 50px; background-repeat: no-repeat; padding: var(--wp--preset--spacing--xxx-small); }
